messages.content: Jerry Roodhouse has a proven track record of promoting the interests and causes of the people of Rugby to great effect for 25 years.

mentions.candidate: Jerry Roodhouse is the Councillor who is seen in his ward month in and month out.

issues.economy: Jerry has campaigned on...fuel poverty and affordable warmth.
issues.governance: At a national level, Jerry has worked with organisations such as the Audit Commission and has helped developed national housing policy.
issues.health: Jerry has campaigned on...the Hospital of St Cross, Mental Health Service, Dignity in Care for Older people, Rugby growth proposals, fire station closure.

housing.content: Jerry has worked with organisations such as the Audit Commission and has helped developed national housing policy.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jerry Roodhouse has a proven track record of promoting the interests and causes of the people of Rugby to great effect for 25 years.

politicalExperience.achievements: As a long-standing Borough and County Councillor he has operated at the community-edge of politics, never afraid to challenge the establishment and be unpopular with officials and political opponents in pursuit of his constituents' interests. He is non-strategy, straight-talking voice is now ready to be heard at Westminster.
Jerry is involved in the voluntary sector working closely with organisations such as Age Concern and homelessness charities.

contactInformation.address: Return to: Benn Liberal Democrats - FREEPOST RSU-KYYE-UBHY, 112 Carlton Road, RUGBY, CV22 7PE.

images.caption: Jerry Roodhouse your next Member of Parliament

leaflet.additionalNotes: Does politics make you see red or give you the Blues? Doesn't Rugby deserve a Brighter Future?
